$g_1$ parks vehicle $m_1=s_2$ in/at $s_3$.
manri modal, 1st place (by standard 2) in reference frame ...
convert letteral string or other mathematical expression (mex) operand to mex operator.
selma'o quote; quotes a word (a cmavo) and uses it to name a selma'o.
valsi.notes: Example: ma'oi coi is equivalent to COI. See also {ra'oi}.

valsi.definition: $x_1=l_1$ is a list of structure words $x_2=l_2=c_1$ of class(es) $x_5=c_2$ of language $x_6=c_3$ in order $x_3=l_3$ in medium $x_4=l_4$.
digit/number: plus sign; positive number; default any positive.
$x_1$ is an cation of radical/(atom of element)$x_2$ with $x_3$ charges.
$c_1$ is a college at $c_2$ teaching subject $c_3$ to audience $c_4=m_1$ operated by $c_5$.
valsi.notes: An institution for adult education at a basic or intermediate level (teaching those of any age). Cf. {ckule}, {balcu'e}.

valsi.definition: $b_1=n_1=m_1$ is a bull [adult male cattle/beef-producer/bovine] of species/breed $b_2$.
$n_1=m_1$ is a man/men (adult); x1 is a male humanoid, adult in development-quality $m_2$ (ka).
$n_1=m_1$ is a woman/women (adult); x1 is a female humanoid, adult in development-quality $m_2$ (ka).
$x_{1}$ is a derogative connotation/sense of $x_{2}$ used by $x_{3}$; $x_{3}$ derogates/'curses at' $x_{2}$ in form $x_{1}$.
valsi.notes: Bloody (British sense), fucking, shit, goddamn. See also {palci}, {dapma}, {xlali}, {zabna}, {funca}, {ganti}, {ganxo}, {gletu}, {gutra}, {kalci}, {pinca}, {pinji}, {plibu}, {vibna}, {vlagi}, {zargu}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a ferret.
$x_{1}$ is a mammal/'animal'/beast of species $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ (event/action/process) is manual [not automatic] in function $x_{2}$ under conditions $x_{3}$.
Madrid
Medina
$n_1=m_1$ is the moral of story/situation $m_3$ and entails action/event/state $n_2$.
$s_1$ (mass of facts) is the study of conduct-governing standards $s_2=m_1$ based on methodology $s_3$.
valsi.notes: Major branches of ethics include "meta-ethics" ({ckaji zei madyske}), "normative ethics" ({bilga zei madyske}), "applied ethics" ({pilno zei madyske}), "moral psychology" ({menli zei madyske}), and "descriptive ethics" ({skicu zei madyske}). Cf. {saske}.

valsi.definition: $c_1=m_2$ moralizes expressing $c_2$ (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) to audience $c_3$ via expressive medium $c_4$ using/based on ethics/morals/moral standards/ethical standards $m_1$
$c_1=m_3$ is a wizard/sorcerer of $m_1=c_1$, which is magical to $m_2$, with standard of sorcery $c_3$.
$x_1$ is $x_2$ millimeters of mercury by standard $x_3$.
$x_1$ is an amalgam of composition including $x_2$.
utterance ordinal suffix; converts a number to an ordinal, such as an item or paragraph number.
$k_1$ is an elementary fermion [quark or lepton]/matter particle/smallest measurable increment of matter/property/activity $k_2=m_1$.
$z_1$ physically exists/is a physical reality for $z_2$ under metaphysics$z_3$.

$x_1=s_1=m_1$ is the material environment/surrounding material (i.e. gaseous/liquid atmosphere, vacuum, etc.) enclosing $x_2=s_2$ in direction(s)/dimensions(s)/plane $x_3=s_3=m_3$, of type/composition including $x_4=m_2$.
valsi.notes: A vacuum is arguably not 'material', but the word is much more convenient if that is included. Also, vacuum is never completely empty. See also {marji}, {sruri}, {gapci}, {litki}, {kunti}, {sakci}, {kensa}.

valsi.definition: Mecca
$x_{1}$ is mature/ripe/fully-grown/adult in development-quality $x_{2}$ (ka).
$x_{1}$ is magic/supernatural/sorcery/witchcraft/wizardry to $x_{2}$, performed by person/force/deity $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is a compass with magnet $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a poppy of species $x_2$
$x_{1}$ is magnetic [adjective] producing magnetic field $x_{2}$.
$v_4=m_1$ is a magnetic storage medium storing $v_2$ (data/facts/du'u) about $v_3$ (object/event) in file(s) $v_1$.
$s_1$ is an idol/a sign/symbol representing god/demon/property (perjorative sense) $s_2$ to observer $s_3$.
valsi.notes: In the Bible the gods and their images were first conceived of as identical; but in later times a distinction was drawn between the god and the image.

valsi.definition: $c_1$ is junk food for $c_2$.
$f_1=m_1$ is vulgar/uncouth in property $f_2=m_2$ (ka) among members $f_3$ (set).
$f_1=m_2$ (event/property) is determined by the bad luck/fortune of $f_2$.
$x_1$ is Malagasy in aspect $x_2$.
$g_1=m_1$ is an anglicism (in Lojban), inappropriate according to $m_3$.
valsi.notes: Refers to any kind of reliance upon English in a Lojban expression, but is most common for calques. Is sometimes even extended to cover reliance upon cultural assumptions. ``malglico'' is a much more common form.

valsi.definition: $mak_1$ is black magic to $mak_2$, performed by person/force/deity $mak_3$.
$m_1$ is a black widow spider of variety $m_2$.
$ma_1=mi_1=g_2$ is ill-lit with light $g_1$ from light source $g_3$.
Malmö
valsi.notes: Malmö, in the southernmost province of Scania, is the third most populous city in Sweden.

valsi.definition: $f_2$ is unlucky/unfortunate in $f_1=m_2$ (event/property).
$x_{1}$ is a temple/church/sanctuary/synagogue/shrine of religion $x_{2}$ at location/serving area $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: $x_2$ may be event of form (... worships/pays/respect to ...), hence (metaphorically extending to) monument (= {mojmalsi}, {si'armalsi}). See also {cevni}, {krici}, {lijda}, {ritli}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is sluggish at doing/being $x_2$ (ka)
$x_1$ is unwelcome by $x_2$ to place/event $x_3$.
Mom/Mum
valsi.notes: The rafsi for {mamta} used as a familiar name. See also {paf}, {bes}, {tix}, {bun}, {mes}.

valsi.definition: $m_1=b_1$ is a cow [an adult female bovine] of variety/breed $b_2$ that has had calf/calves $m_2$
$g_1$ has sex/copulates with the mother of $g_2=m_2$.
$m_1=j_1$ is a hen of species/breed $j_2$ with offspring $x_3=m_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a mother of $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ bears/mothers/acts maternally toward $x_{2}$; [not necessarily biological].
$x_1$ is a maternal grandmother of $x_2$.
$b_1=m_1$ darkens under conditions $x_2=b_3$.
$x_{1}$ feels wonder/awe/marvels about $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a mandala
$x_1$ is manioc of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ (object/event) is uniform/homogeneous in property $x_{2}$ (ka).
$t_1=m_1$ is livery/[a uniform] for wearing by $t_2$ for purpose $t_3$.
$x_1$ is a mango [fruit] of species/variety $x_2$.
valsi.notes: {rutrmango} is the non-experimental synonym of “mango”. {ricrmango} for “mango tree”.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is dark/lacking in illumination.
$x_{1}$ is a frame of reference/standard for observing/measuring/determining $x_{2}$, with/by rules $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: ($x_1$ may be object or si'o idea); See also cmavo list {ma'i}, {ckilu}, {merli}, {pajni}, {cimde}, {jdice}, {marde}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ satisfies evaluator $x_{2}$ in property (ka)/state $x_{3}$.
$g_1=m_2$ is contently happy about/with $m_1$ with regard to $g_2=m_3$ (event/state).
$n_1$ needs $n_2$ to be satisfied for reason $x_3$.
valsi.notes: $n_2$ must be a physical object, not an event; for that, use {djica}. See also: {mansa}, {nitcu}

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is an ant of species/breed $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is carbon monoxide.
$j_1$ is a termite of species $j_2$.
$mam_1$ is an ant queen of ants $mam_2=man_1$ of species/breed $man_2$.
$x_1$ is formic acid.
$z_1$ is an anthill of ants $z_2=m_1$.
$z_1$ becomes darker/darkens by amount $z_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a cap/hat/crown/helmet/piece of headgear [head-top garment] of material $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of cotton [type of fabric/material].
$x_1$ is eucalyptus of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ fits/matches/suits/is compatible/appropriate/corresponds to/with $x_{2}$ in property/aspect $x_{3}$.
$p_1$ is a hatter/millner /[hat maker] selling/making hats of material $m_2$.
$x_1$ is dodder of species/variety $x_2$ parasitic on $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a shelter/haven/refuge/retreat/harbor for/protecting $x_{2}$ from danger/threat $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a vehicle/mode of transport carrying $x_{2}$ in/on surface/medium $x_{3}$, propelled by $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ are the ethics/morals/moral standards/ethical standards of $x_{2}$ (ind./mass) about situation $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: $x_1$ will (typically) be an abstract, a rule or rules of behavior; also principles; also conscience (= {sezmarde}). See also {palci}, {vrude}, {lijda}, {manri}, {javni}, {tarti}, {zekri}.

valsi.definition: $d_1$ is positive electric charge in $d_2$.
$x_1$ is neem/margosa/azedarac of species/variety $x_2$.
valsi.notes: See also {zdiraxa}, {andiroba}. "Azedarach" and variants have referred to both this tree and the {zdiraxa}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/made of mercury/quicksilver; [metaphor: fluid metal; temperature].
$x_{1}$ is material/stuff/matter of type/composition including $x_{2}$ in shape/form $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also (adjective:) $x_1$ is physical (one sense)/material. See also {morna}, {mucti}, {nejni}, {tarmi}, {dacti}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a passionfruit/passionflower of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_1$ is malaria caused by Plasmodium species $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a marmot/woodchuck/groundhog of species $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of hemp/marijuana/jute of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$b_1$ is canvas made of hemp.
$s_1$ is a spliff/cigarette made from marijuana and tobacco $s_2=m_1=t_1$ by $s_3$.
$s_1$ is a joint/spliff/cigarette made from marijuana $s_2=m_1$ by $s_3$.
$v_1$ smokes cannabis of type $m_2$.
$x_1$ is/contains marzipan of type/brand $x_2$
$x_{1}$ [force] mashes/crushes/squashes/smashes $x_{2}$ into pulp/mash/crumbs/deformed mass $x_{3}$.
Moscow
valsi.notes: Cf. {moskov}. Lojbanized pronunciations of the Russian capital are: 'masKVA'(Russian, but KV combination is invalid in lojban), 'mosiKY' (Chinese Mandarin; there is no 'v' in Chinese and 'f' is unusual except at the beginning of a word) and 'mosko' or 'moskau' in English.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is slow/sluggish at doing/being/bringing about $x_{2}$ (event/state).
$m_1$ is a basilica [church] for purpose $m_2$.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ months in duration (default is 1 month) by month standard $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: This month (= {cabma'i}); next month (= {bavla'ima'i}); last month (= {prula'ima'i}). See also {detri}, {djedi}, {jeftu}, {nanca}.

valsi.definition: $c_1$ is a parish of parishioners $c_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a mat/pad/mattress/pallet [flat, soft, dense form] of material $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of linen/flax [type of fabric/material].
$x_1$ is flax of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_1$ is flaxseed/linseed produced by plant $x_2$, capable of growing into $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains butter/oleo/margarine/shortening from source $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: (adjective:) $x_1$ is buttery; an edible fat, solid but spreadable at normal temperatures; dairy butter (= {ladmatne}). See also {grasu}, {kruji}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a is a quantity of nutmeg butter from source $x_2$.
valsi.notes: See also nutmeg tree (={ricrmiristika}), nutmeg seed (={tsirmiristika}).

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a/the buttercup flower of plant/species $x_2$.
$p_1$ approves $m_1$ for $m_2$ in property aspect $m_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a motor/engine, driving/propelling/providing power to $x_{2}$.
$mar_1$ is a motor/road vehicle for carrying $mar_2$ on road $d_1=mar_3$, propelled by $mar_4$, with motor/engine $mat_1$.
$x_1$ is June of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$b_1$ becomes fitting with $m_2$ in property/aspect $m_3$.
$g_1$ assigns/appoints $m_1$ to $m_2$.
zmadu modal, 1st place (a greater) exceeded by ... ; usually a sumti modifier.
attitudinal: stronger intensity attitudinal relativizer
valsi.notes: Specifies a stronger intensity - relative to any previously specified intensity of the same UI/cmavo. CAI2 after CAI specifies an absolute intensity - but the CAI2 specifies the relative shift from the regular value. CAI after CAI2 specifies an relative value - and the CAI denotes the relative amount interval size. See also {me'ai}, {dau'i}, {sai}

valsi.definition: $d_1$ prefers $d_1=m_1$ (event/state) to $m_2$ for purpose $d_3$ by amount/excess $z_4$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of oats [grain] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$p_1$ is a quantity of oatmeal/porridge made from oat species $p_2=m_2$
valsi.notes: (m1 is subsumed in definitional part) see {mavji},{pesxu} see also {mavystasu}

valsi.definition: $x1=s1$ is porridge of type $x2=m2$
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of wheat [grain] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$c_1=m_1$ stomps on surface $c_2$ using limbs $c_3$ crushing $m_2$ into pulp mass $m_3$.
$s_1$ is a crash (sound) produced by $m_1$ smashing into $m_2$.
convert sumti to selbri/tanru element; $x_{1}$ is specific to [sumti] in aspect $x_{2}$.
mleca modal, 1st place (a lesser) undercut by ... ; usually a sumti modifier.
attitudinal: weaker intensity attitudinal relativizer
valsi.notes: Specifies a stronger intensity - relative to any previously specified intensity of the same UI/cmavo. See also {mau'i}, {dau'i}, {ru'e}

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is henna of species/variety $x_2$.
Convert abstract predicate sumti back to predicate
cmene modal, 1st place (requires quote) with name ...; so-called ...
sumti question asking for a name; who?; requires quoted name as an answer.
Article for abstract predicate sumti
digit/number: less than.
$s_1$ is a sister's spouse of $m_2$ under law/custom/tradition/system/convention $sp_3$.
the mathematical expression (unevaluated); convert unevaluated mathematical expression to sumti.
non-Lojban brivla
valsi.notes: Quick way to borrow foreign words into Lojban. Also known as "stage-0 fu'ivla". Equivalent to {me'ei} {zo'oi}.

valsi.definition: elidable terminator: end sumti that was converted to selbri; usually elidable.
$ml_1$ is a temple belonging to $me_2$
$x_{1}$ is a/the brow/forehead [projecting flat/smooth head/body-part] of $x_{2}$.
$b_{1}$=$m_{1}$ is a/the frontal bone [os frontale] performing function $b_2$ in body of $b_{3}$=$m_{2}$
$me_1=t_1$ is least beautiful among set/range $t_3$ to $m_2$ in aspect $me_3$ (ka) by aesthetic standard $me_4$.
$m_1=n_1$ is a negative number relative to origo $m_2$.
$m_1=t_1$ is the least of $m_2=t_4$ in property $m_3$ (ka/ni) by amount $m_4$.
$x_1$ happens less often than $x_2$ in interval $x_3$
$me_1=t_1$ is least ugly among set/range $t_3$ to $me_2$ in aspect $me_3$ (ka) by aesthetic standard $me_4$.
$t_1=b_1$ is the smallest/[ least big] among set/range $t_4$ in property/dimension(s) $b_2$ (ka).
$t_1=c_1$ is the biggest/[ least small] among set/range $t_4$ in property/dimension(s) $c_2$ (ka).
$x_1$ is less than or equal to $x_2$ in property/quantity $x_3$ by amount $x_4$.
$t_1=x_1$ is the worst among set/range $t_4$ for $x_2$ by standard $x_3$.
$m_1=x_1$ is the best/[least bad] among set/range $t_4$ for $x_2$ by standard $x_3$.
$x_1$ is yours among $x_2$ by rule/relationship $x_3$; $x_1$ is your $x_2$ by rule/relationship $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a million [$10^6$] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ tonne(s) [metric unit] in mass (default is 1) by standard $x_{3}$.
convert number to cardinality selbri; $x_{1}$ is the mass formed from set $x_{2}$ whose n member(s) are $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: [$x_1$ is a mass with N components $x_3$ composing set $x_2$; $x_2$ is an n-tuple ($x_2$ is completely specified) (= {selmei} for reordered places); $x_1$ forms an n-some; $x_3$ (not necessarily a complete enumeration) are among the members of $x_2$]; See also {cmima}, {gunma}, cmavo list {moi}.

valsi.definition: Mary
$r_1$ is measured in malaysian ringgit (MYR) as $r_2$ (quantity), in the Algerian monetary system $r_3$.
$x_1$ is an operator/mathematical function/single-valued mapping from domain $x_2$ to range $x_3$ defined by mathematical expression/rule $x_4$.
$x_1$ is the value of expression $x_2$ in base/convention $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ [quantifier/expression] is a mathematical expression interpreted under rules/convention $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is an operand of operator $x_2$ filling place $x_3$ under rules/convention $x_4$.
$x_{1}$ is beautiful/pleasant to $x_{2}$ in aspect $x_{3}$ (ka) by aesthetic standard $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Also handsome, pretty, gorgeous, cute, comely, graceful. See also {pluka}, {xamgu}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ reflects Malaysian/Malay culture/nationality/language in aspect $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a budgerigar (Melopsittacus undulatus) of breed $x_2$.
$x_1$ is mine among $x_2$ by rule/relationship $x_3$; $x_1$ is my $x_2$ by rule/relationship $x_3$.
$c_1=m_2$ (person) is intelligent/smart by standard $c_3$.
$c_1$ reads/watches/listens to/mentally consumes $c_2$.
$f_1=m_1$ (event) is a mental event that happens/occurs/takes place in a/the mind of $m_2$; x1 is an incident/happening/occurrence of thought/dream/feeling/realization or any other mental activity .
$x_{1}$ is a mind/intellect/psyche/mentality/[consciousness] of body $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: (adjective:) $x_1$ is mental/psychological/a mental phenomenon; multiple personalities (= so'i {menli}). See also {besna}, {morji}, {mucti}, {pensi}, {sanji}, {xanri}, {sevzi}, {xadni}.

valsi.definition: $m_1$ is a psychologist/psychiatrist/counsellor/mental health practitioner of client $m_2$ treating ailment $m_3$ with treatment $m_4$.
$g_1$=$me_1$ telekinetically / with its mind moves $mu_1$ to destination/receiver $mu_2$ [away] from origin $mu_3$ over path/route $mu_4$
valsi.notes: Made from {menli}+{muvgau}. {menli}2 dropped on account of irrelevancy. See also {gasnu}, {klama}, {litru}, {makfa}, {menli}, {muvdu}.

valsi.definition: $x_1=k_1$ is able to distinguish between $x_2=ms_1$ and $x_3=ms_2$ under conditions $x_4=k_3$
$x_1=k_1$ is able to distinguish between $x_2=ms_1$ and $x_3=ms_2$ under conditions $x_4=k_3$

$s_1$ (mass of facts) is mental science/psychology about subject matter $s_2$ based on methodology $s_3$.
$x1=m2=c1$ thinks/[mentally says to oneself] $x2=c2$ (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept)
$x_1$ is a quantity of peppermint of species/strain $x_2$
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ minutes in duration (default is 1 minute) by standard $x_{3}$.

$f_1$ is worth $f_2=m_1$ US cents.
$x_1$ is a skunk of genus/species $x_2$.

$m_1=j_1$ is a president of the United States of America.
$j_1=m_1$ is the United State of America as a state.
valsi.notes: A U.S. state, or any part of a federation is referred to as {gugypau}. Cf. {merko}, {jecta}, {bemro}.

valsi.definition: $m_1=k_1$ reflects angloamerican culture/nationality/geography/language in aspect $m_1=k_1$.
valsi.notes: Pertaining to the United States and Canada. Cf. {merko}, {kadno}, {bemro}, {bemjoitco}

American frontier/Wild West/Old West
valsi.notes: From {merko}+{preja}+{jimte}+{stici}= US expanding border to the west.

we; I (the speaker) and at least one another person

valsi.definition: $m_1=c_1$ titters/chuckles/giggles.
$p_1$ (agent) tickles $p_2$ with $p_3$ (a locus on $p_1$ or an instrument) at $p_4$ (a locus on $p_2$).

valsi.definition: $s_1$ is laughter emitted by $s_2=c_1$
self vocative: self-introduction - denial of identity; identifies speaker.

self vocative: self-introduction - denial of identity; denies identity of speaker.

valsi.notes: $m_3$ of {minde} (the desired result) is presumably cointained in he expression of the command. $x_1$ commands $x_3$ with expression $x_2$.

valsi.definition: non-logical interval connective: ordered components: ... center, ... range surrounding center.

discursive: ditto.
$x_1$ is Burmese in aspect $x_2$.
$c_1$ is a first person pronoun in language $c_4$.
$x_1$ simlu $x_2$ mi
$x1=k1$ comes to me from $x2=k3$ via route $x3=k4$ by means $x4=k5$
$m_1=p_1$ is me.
valsi.notes: Used instead of {mi} when a brivla is needed.

valsi.definition: Doctor
$m_1=g_1$ uses surgical implement $k_1$ to operate on organ(s) $k_2$ of patient $m_2$, as a treatment for ailment $m_3$.
$k_1$ is an operating theatre in which to perform surgery $m_4$.
$d_1$ is a clinic/surgery/practice with doctor(s) $m_1$.
$x_1$ is medicine/medical science/medical treatment to $x_2$ for ailment$x_3$ by treatment/cure $x_4$.
$x_1$ is an instance/dose/quantity of medication/medicine/drug $x_2$ for treating ailment $m_3$.
$x_{1}$ is in/at the middle/center/midpoint/[is a focus] of $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is central.
$n_1$ is an instruction for $n_2=m_3$ (event/state) to occur, issued by $n_3=m_1$ for intended recipient $n_4=m_2$.
$v_1$ is a command word/keyword ordering $v_2=m_3$ (event/state) in language $v_3$.
$x_{1}$ is encoded/cipher text of plain-text $x_{2}$ by code/coding system $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is in code; $x_{3}$ is a code.
$s_1$ is a block of cipher $m_3$
valsi.notes: A block of ciphertext. See also {selmifsle}. m3 is not necessarily a block cipher; it could be a byte stream cipher, in which case s1 is a byte. Also, codon; see {mivmifsle}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a meal with meal dish $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a diameter between $x_2$ and $x_3$ of $x_4$.
$x_{1}$ doctors/treats/nurses/[cures]/is physician/midwife to $x_{2}$ for ailment $x_{3}$ by treatment/cure $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Also medic; (adjective:) $x_1$, $x_4$ is medical; $x_2$ is a patient of $x_1$ (= selmikce for reordered places) ; $x_2$ is treated by $x_1$ person/$x_4$ treatment/method; successfully cure transitive (= {sadmikce}, {sadvelmikce}), intransitive (= sadyselmikce, ka'orbi'o to not imply an external agent/process, though the $x_1$ and $x_4$ of mikce may be self/internal); treatment (= {velmikce}). See also {bilma}, {kanro}, {spita}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a millionth [$10^{-6}$] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$m_1$ is a hagfish of species $m_2$.
$x_1$ is $x_2$ microseconds in duration.
$g_1$ is $g_2$ micrograms in mass (default is 1) by standard $g_3$.
$g1$ is $g2$ milligrams in mass by standard $g3$
$x_1$ is $x_2$ milliseconds in duration.
$x_{1}$ is a thousandth [1/1000; $10^{-3}$] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$mit_1=mil_1$ is $mit_2=mil_1$ (one by default) millimeter(s) in length measured in direction $mit_3$ by standard $mit_4$.
$b_1$ is a microwave (wave with wave-length between 1mm and 1m) in medium $b_2$, wave-form $b_3$, wave length $b_4$, frequency $b_5$
$x_{1}$ is mild/non-extreme/gentle/middling/somewhat in property $x_{2}$ (ka); $x_{1}$ is not very $x_{2}$.
$l_1=m_1$ is $l_2$ milliliter(s)/millilitre(s) [metric unit] in volume (default is 1) by standard $l_3$.
$x_1$ is a sequence of members $x_2$, $x_3$, $x_4$, ... in that order.
valsi.notes: The ordering rule is simply the order of the arguments, the unordered set is the set with members x2, x3, x4, ...

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ issues commands/orders to $x_{2}$ for result $x_{3}$ (event/state) to happen; $x_{3}$ is commanded to occur.
valsi.notes: [also: $x_1$ orders/sets/Triggers. $x_2$ to do/bring about $x_3$; $x_1$ is a commander; commanded (= {termi'e})]; See also {lacri}, te {bende}, {jatna}, {ralju}, {jitro}, {turni}, {tinbe}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a machine for use/function $x_{2}$; [automated apparatus, without direct function control].
valsi.notes: Also machinery/mechanism; a machine is initiated/triggered by an agent/force, but thereafter performs its function automatically; if self-directed, (a minji is an) entity (= {zukte}). See also {cabra}, {matra}, {tutci}, {zukte}, {pilno}, {skami}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ (default 1) long local distance unit(s) [non-metric], $x_{3}$ subunits, standard $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: (additional subunit places may be added as $x_5$, $x_6$, ...); See also {mitre}, {kilto}, {clani}, {ganra}, {condi}, {rotsu}, {rupnu}, {fepni}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {bunda}, {kramu}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ reflects/mirrors/echoes $x_{2}$ [object/radiation] to observer/point $x_{3}$ as $x_{4}$; $x_{2}$ bounces on $x_{1}$.
valsi.notes: Also: $x_1$ is a mirror/reflector. $x_2$ may be light, lu'e of an imaged object; $x_4$ may be image or echo or the same as $x_2$ if physical object; $x_3$ may be a path for a bounced object; ka is reflection. See also {catlu}, {viska}, {lenjo}, {pensi}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is the same/identical thing as $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$; ($x_{1}$ and $x_{2}$ interchangeable).
valsi.notes: (cf. {panra}, {satci}, {mapti}, {simsa}, {drata}, {dunli}, cmavo list {du} - which has no standard place, {simxu})

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of krypton (Kr).
$x_{1}$ keeps $x_{2}$ secret/hidden from $x_{3}$ by method $x_{4}$; $x_{2}$ is a secret; $x_{1}$ hides/conceals $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Intransitive hidden/secret, without an agent (= {selcri} or {nalterju'o}); secret (= {selmipri}). See also {stace}, {mifra}, {sivni}, {djuno}, {cirko}, {jarco}.

valsi.definition: $s_1$ (place) hides $m_2=s_2$ from $m_3$ by method $m_4$; $s_1$ is a hiding place.
$x_1$ is a bug of species $x_2$.
$tu_1=m_2$ is a bug used by $ti_1=m_1$ to listen to $ti_2$ without $mi_3$ being aware.
$f_1=m_1$ secretly opposes $f_2=m_3$ regarding $f_3$ (abstract) with secrecy method $m_4$.
$x_1=p_1=m_1$ hides/conceals $x_2=p_2$ from $x_4=m_3$ on/at surface/locus $x_3=p_3=m_1$, the location being kept secret by method $x_5=m_4$.
$z_1$ spies/snoops on $z_2$ using senses/means $z_3$ under conditions $z_4$.
$t_1=z_1$ is a spyware installed on computer(s) including $s_1$ which spies on $z_2$ (victim(s)) under conditions $z_4$.
$x_1$ glitters/sparkles/glares, reflecting $x_2$ to observer $x_3$.
$l_1$ is symmetrical about axis $m_1$.
$x_{1}$ is a deer/elk/moose/[hart/stag/doe] of species/breed $x_{2}$.
$s_1$ is symmetrical about axis $m_1$.
$s_1=m_4$ is a notion of $s_2=m_2$ to cognizer $s_3=m_3$.
valsi.notes: A mental reflection of real objects and phenomena in their essential features and relations. Cf. {sidbo}, {selpei}, {selga'e}, {tarmi}.

valsi.definition: $s_1=m_4$ is an echo of sound $m_2=s_2$, reflected by $m_1$ and heard by $m_3$.
$x_1$ is a blueberry/bog bilberry/whortleberry/evergreen bilberry/(Subgenus Vaccinium) of species/variety $x_2$
$x_{1}$ (person/object/event) is famous/renowned/is a celebrity among community of persons $x_{2}$ (mass).
valsi.notes: Also celebrated/well-known; (derogative meanings:) notorious/infamous (= {malmi'o}; these could also be expressed using the referenced words). See also se {sinma}, {banli}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ reflects Egyptian culture/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.

$m_1=s_2$ is glorified by $s_1$.

$s_1=m_1$ seems to be the same as $m_2$ by standard $m_3$ to observer $s_3$ under conditions $s_4$.
$mo_1=mi_1$ follows the same pattern as $mi_2$ with respect to forms/events $mo_2$ arranged according to structure $mo_3$.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ meter(s) [metric unit] in length (default 1) measured in direction $x_{3}$ by standard $x_{4}$.
$v_1=m_1$ is a synonym of $m_2$ by standard $m_3$ in language $v_3$.
$x_1$ is a mitochondrion of cell $x_2$ of organism $x_3$
$m_1=j_1=c_1$ cannibalizes $c_2$. $m_1=j_1=c_1$ is a cannibal.
$x_1=m_1$ is a zoo at $x_3=m_3$ with animals $x_2=m_2=j_1=d_1$.
$g_1$ reincarnates/resurrects $j_1$ by standard $j_2$.
$jd_1=jm_1$ is a jelly fish.
$m_1$ is nature/the world of living things $m_2=j_1$, defined by rules $m_3$.
$x_1=m_1$ is a life-goal of $x_3=m_3=j_1$ motivating $x_2=m_2$ .
$j_1=s_2$ is immortal by standard $j_2$.
$j_1$ is/are (a) alga/algae [organism].
valsi.notes: Algae are a very large and diverse group of simple, typically autotrophic organisms, ranging from unicellular to multicellular forms. Most are photosynthetic and "simple" because they lack the many distinct cell and organ types found in land plants. The largest and most complex marine forms are called seaweeds (={jauspa}).

valsi.definition: $p_1$ is the life of $j_1$ through stages $p_4$.
valsi.notes: This focuses on the process of x2's life as a succession of stages (childhood, chrysalis, etc.), while {nunji'e} more generally denotes the event of x2 being alive without a default terbri to specify the stages x2 goes through during that event.

valsi.definition: $l_1$ is adenosine triphosphate (ATP) transporting energy within organism $l_2=j_1$.

valsi.definition: $r_{1}$ is an organelle of $r_{2}$=$s_{1}$=$j_{1}$ performing function $r_{3}$.

$xu_1$ is an instance of chemical substance $xu_2$ derived from biological source $j_1$.

valsi.definition: $f_1$ is a flatfish of family/genus/species $f_2$, swimming with side $m_1$ upward.

valsi.notes: The lateral frame of reference is that of the one who sidesteps. Cf. {mlana}, {klama}, {koizva}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a paperbark/tea tree of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is to the side of/lateral to $x_{2}$ and facing $x_{3}$ from point of view/in-frame-of-reference $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: (cf. {crane}, {trixe}, {pritu}, {zunle} which differ in that the direction of facing is the front and not the lateral side. The $x_4$ of mlana may be either the front, or back side of $x_2$, {korbi})

valsi.notes: $x_3=f_1$, the exact direction, is unspecified. Cf. {mlana}, {farna}.

$x_{1}$ is less than $x_{2}$ in property/quantity $x_{3}$ (ka/ni) by amount $x_{4}$.

valsi.notes: me2, me4 dropped. g2 is lo nu me1 melbi zi'o me3

valsi.definition: $j_1$ is vain.

$ml_1=me_1$ is less beautiful than $ml_2$ to $me_2$ in aspect $me_3$ (ka) by amount $ml_4$.

valsi.notes: The term comes from the Greek kallipygos, (first used for the Venus Kallipygos) which literally means "beautiful buttocks".

pro-bridi: bridi/selbri/brivla question.
digit/number: too few; subjective.
tense interval modifier: too few times; objective tense; defaults as time tense.
convert sumti to mex operand; sample use in story arithmetic: [3 apples] + [3 apples] = what.
mark motions in space-time.

valsi.definition: Morse; Morse code, telegraphy.
$x_{1}$ is dead/has ceased to be alive.
Moscow

valsi.definition: $l_1$ drags/hauls $l_2=m_2$ by handle/at locus $l_3$ along surface $m_3$.

$d_1$ is $d_2$ (default 1) tablespoon(s)/tablespoonful(s) [volume-unit], standard $d_3=m_1$ (default 1=15 mL),$d_4$ dessertspoon(s),$d_5$ teaspoon(s), $d_6$ one ml measuring spoon(s).
valsi.notes: x3 could be a particular spoon. x3 could also be for example the Australian standard (={lo sralo}; 20 mL) or the unofficial unit of the Apothecaries' system of measures in the 18th century, equal to 4 drams or 1/2 fluid oz. It was more commonly known by the Latin cochleare majus (abbreviated cochl. maj.) or, in Apothecaries' notation, f℥ss or f℥ß.

valsi.definition: $d_1$ is/are tablespoon(s) [measuring instrument] containing/holding/enclosing $v_2$, of volume $d_2$ (default 1) tablespoon(s)/tablespoonful(s) [volume-unit], standard $d_3=m_1$ (default 1=15 mL).
valsi.notes: Tablespoon (measuring instrument) doesn't need to have the shape/form of a spoon. See also: tablespoon (measuring unit;={mucydekpu}). Containment x2 need not be total.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a spork/combined spoon and fork for use $x_2$

$d_4$ is $d_2$ (default 1) dessertspoon(s)/dessertspoonful(s)/cochleare medium (dstspn./cochl. med.) [volume-unit], standard $d_3=m_1$ (default 1 dessertspoon=10 mL),$d_1$ tablespoon(s),$d_5$ teaspoon(s), $d_6$ one ml measuring spoon(s).
valsi.notes: As a unit of culinary measure, a level dessertspoon (dstspn.) equals two teaspoons, or 10 milliliters. As a unit of Apothecary measure, the dessert-spoon was an unofficial but widely used unit of fluid measure equal to two fluid drams, or 1⁄4 fluid ounce. (One) Rounded dessertspoon (=lo mucyveldekpu li ji'i ni'u), one heaped dessertspoon (=lo derxi mucydekpu li pa), one level dessertspoon (=lo mucyveldekpu li ji'inai).

valsi.definition: $d_1$ is/are dessertspoon(s) [measuring instrument] containing/holding/enclosing $v_2$, of volume $d_2$ (default 1) dessertspoon(s)/dessertspoonful(s) [volume-unit], standard $d_3=m_1$ (default 1=10 mL).
valsi.notes: Teaspoon (measuring instrument) doesn't need to have the shape/form of a spoon. See also: teaspoon (measuring unit;={mucyveldekpu}). Containment x2 need not be total.

valsi.definition: $d_5$ is $d_2$ (default 1) teaspoon(s)/teaspoonful(s)/cochleare minus (t., ts., tsp. or tspn./cochl. min.)[volume-unit], standard $d_3=m_1$ (default 1 teaspoon=5 mL),$d_4$ dessertspoon(s),$d_1$ tablespoon(s), $d_6$ one ml measuring spoon(s).
valsi.notes: See also: tablespoon (={mucydekpu}). (One) Rounded teaspoon (=lo mucyveldekpu li ji'i ni'u), one heaped teaspoon (=lo derxi mucydekpu li pa), one level teaspoon (=lo mucyveldekpu li ji'inai).

Nora LeChevalier (was Tansky)

Norden/the Nordic countries
Norway.

tense interval modifier: never; objectively quantified tense; defaults as time tense.
$x_1$ is indifferent/neutral/apathetic about event $x_2$, expected likelihood $x_3$.
$x_1$ is indifferent/apathetic/dispassionate/uninvolved/unmoved towards/with/by $x_2$.
$x_1=c_2$ is disinterested in $x_2=c_1$.
$t_1$ is neither quenched from nor thirsty for drink/fluid/lubricant $t_2$.
valsi.notes: On a scale between “quenched” and “thirsty”, $t_1$ is roughly at the midpoint. See also: {taske}, {toltaske}, {no'e}.

valsi.definition: $s_1=v_1$ is an interpretation of $s_2$ recognized by $s_3$ but judged unimportant by $v_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a norovirus of species/breed/defining property $x_{2}$ capable of infecting [at] $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: From the city of Norwalk, Ohio, and {vidru}. The scientific name of the virus was first "Norwalk agent" and then shortened to "norovirus". See also {xilvidru}, {remjinkytoldu'evidru} and {vidru}.

valsi.definition: $xa_1$ is neither sated from nor hungry for food/fuel $xa_1$.
valsi.notes: On a scale between “being hungry” and “being sated”, $xa_1$ is roughly at the midpoint of it. See also: {xagji}, {tolxagji}, {no'e}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is indifferent towards $x_2$.
$l_2$ is blurry/indistinct/unfocused at location $l_3$
valsi.notes: (while L1 is explicitly elided, L4 is equally implicitly elided as being nonsensical in the absence of a physical lens) This can apply to any bodily sense, e.g, a sound may be unclear.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a message/notice/memorandum about subject $x_{2}$ from author $x_{3}$ to intended audience $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Emphasis on brevity, single or identifiable subject (contrast with xatra: the emphasis in notci is on the single or cohesively focused subject, while the audience is less defined - indeed only an 'intended' audience. xatra need not have a single or focussed subject - its corresponding place is for 'content'); reminder/memo/note (= {mojnoi}). See also {xatra}, {nuzba}, {mrilu}, {morji}.

valsi.definition: $c_1$ notes down $c_2$ on display/storage medium $c_3$ with writing implement $c_4$.
$c_1$ announces/proclaims $c_2$ (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) for audience $c_3=n_4$ via expressive medium $c_4$.
$x_1$ is Chechen in aspect $x_2$
abstractor: generalized event abstractor; $x_{1}$ is state/process/achievement/activity of [bridi].
convert mathematical expression (mex) operator to a selbri/tanru component.
vocative: promise - promise release - un-promise.
vocative: promise - promise release - un-promise.
vocative: promise - promise release - un-promise.
start forethought termset construct; marks start of place structure set with logical connection.
modal aspect: can but has not; unrealized potential.
$g_1$ is virgin/sexually inexperienced
$b_1$ is a pollard/(muley)/polled cattle [beef-producer/bovine] of species/breed $b_2$ (usually horned).

New Orleans
$x_{1}$ is magenta/fuchsia/purplish-red [color adjective].

$n_1$ is an rhetoric event/speech/rhetorical performance by $b_1=c_1$ (agent) verbally expressing $c_2$ (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) for audience $c_3$, good/beneficial/nice for $x_2$ by standard $x_3$.
$n_1$ is an event of $b_1$ being foolish/silly/stupid in event/action /property (ka) $b_2$.
$n_1$ is a conversation involving $c_1$(s) (mass normally, but 1 individual/jo'u possible) about topic/subject $c_2$.
$n_1$ is the killing by $c_1$ of $c_2$ by action/method $c_3$.
$n_1$ is the youth of $c_1$.
$x_1=n_1$ is a change in property/quantity $x_2=c_2$ (ka/ni) of amount/degree $x_3=c_3$ under conditions $x_4=c_4$.
$n_1$ is order (state of being well arranged) of $c_1$ with orderliness $c_2$.
$n_1$ is an event at which $c_1$ eat(s) $c_2$.
$n_1$ is a fight/battle in which $d_1$ fights $d_2$ over issue $d_3$ (abstract).
$n_1$ is a fight/battle in which $d_1$ fights $d_2$ over issue $d_3$ (abstract).
$n_1$ is a dance with dancer(s) $d_1$ (individual, mass) to music/rhythm $d_2$.
$n_1$ is a pause by $d_1$ for/until $d_2$ at state $d_3$ before starting/continuing $d_4$ (activity/process).
$n_1$ is a pause by $d_1$ for/until $d_2$ at state $d_3$ before starting/continuing $d_4$ (activity/process).
$n_1$ is the equality of rights $k_1=d_3$ entitled to $k_2=d_1=d_2$.
$n_1$ is a facial expression (countenance) of agent $f_2=c_1$ expressing $f_1=c_2$.
$n_1$ is a trial of dispute $j_2$ involving people $f_3$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {nu}, {pajni}, {tavla}, {fapro}, {nunpai}, {flapaizda}. x3 includes not only the disputing parties but also the judge and juries, which may be connected with "jo'u".

valsi.definition: $n_1$ is the decay/fermentation (recycling of matter/energy/electrons) of $f_1$ by chemical agent $f_2$.
$x1=n1$ is joy of $x2=g1$ from $x3=g2$
$n_1$ is fishery (fish industry) of product $c_2$ (aquatic animals) from source/area $c_3=t_1$ (ocean/sea/coast/lake/river) by fishermen $c_1$.
valsi.notes: x2 can be any harvestable aquatic animals, including mollusks and crustaceans. Cf. {crepu}.

valsi.definition: $n_1$ is the life of $j_1$.
$x_1$ is a gathering/meeting/assembly/conclave/conference/ congregation/congress/convention/encounter/get-together/reunion of participants $x_2$ at location $x_3$ from locations $x_4$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {nu}, {jmaji}, {jdijmaji}, {nunpe'i} for a meeting between two parties.

valsi.definition: $n_1$ is an established connection between $j_1$ and $j_2$ at common locus $j_3$.
valsi.notes: $n_1$ or $j_1$ may be a mass formed with "joi", as is the case in a computer network between a server and clients. Cf. {jorne}, {srana}.

valsi.definition: $n_1$ is a condition of $ku_1$ managing the health of $ka_1$.
valsi.notes: Usually the prevention, treatment, and management of illness and the preservation of mental and physical well-being through the services offered by the medical, nursing, and allied health professions. x2 and x3 may the same or different. Cf. {kamnu'a}.

valsi.definition: $n_1$ is a game played by $k_1$ playing with plaything/toy $k_2$

$n_1$ is the laugh/laughter of/by $c_1$

$n_1$ is the death (state of being dead) of $m_1$ (person).
$n_1$ is the event of $m_1$ motivating action $m_2$ per volition $m_3$.

$x_{1}$ is a believe-deceived with deceive-belief subject $x_{2}$ with deception subject $x_{3}$.

$n_1$ is the event of $n_1$ being a man.
valsi.notes: There are for example theories of performativity and gender, in which case you can consider masculinity as an event.

valsi.definition: $n_1$ is the freedom of $z_1$ doing $z_2$ under condition $z_3$.
$x_{1}$ (agent) promises/commits/assures/threatens $x_{2}$ (event/state) to $x_{3}$ [beneficiary/victim].

$f_1$ is a backup / danger avoiding duplicate / copy of $f_2=s_1$ in form / medium $f_3$ made by method $f_4$ to protect / secure against event $s_2$ (generally destruction or loss).

valsi.notes: Also $x_2$ dispute/struggle (though $x_2$ is not limited to disagreements, which is merely one manifestation of scalar or distributed values in which there is a medial position). See also {midju}, {lanxe}, {milxe}, {mutce}, cmavo list {no'e}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ (du'u) is news/tidings/new information about subject $x_{2}$ from source $x_{3}$, to observer $x_{4}$.

number/quantity: 18 [eighteen].
number/quantity: 13 [thirteen].
$x_{1}$ hopes/wishes for/desires $x_{2}$ (event), expected likelihood $x_{3}$ (0-1); $x_{1}$ hopes that $x_{2}$ happens.
valsi.notes: Also: $x_1$ is hopeful of $x_2$; $x_2$ will hopefully occur, as hoped for by $x_1$; the value of $x_3$ is a subjective estimate of likeliness according to $x_1$, and is the basic determinant of whether pacna means 'hope' or 'wish' or 'expect': hoping for objects/states with negligible expectation is "wishing"; if the state is plausibly likely, it is "hoping"; when the probability is subjectively near 1, the attitude is described as "expecting"; the value will usually be expressed using inexact numbers ("{li} {piso'u}" to "{li} {piro}"); wish (= {sotpa'a}), hope (= {sorpa'a}), expect (= {sojypa'a}). See also {djica}.

valsi.definition: $t_1$ is the Hell of evil spirit(s) $t_2=pa_1=pr_1$, evil by standard $pa_2$.

Dad
valsi.notes: The rafsi for {patfu} used as a familar name. See also {mam}, {bes}, {tix}, {bun}, {mes}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a paternal grandmother of $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a paternal grandfather of $x_2$.

valsi.definition: $p_1=g_1$ is a constituent country of $p_2$ (sovereign state / supranational body).
digit/number: pi (approximately 3.1416...).

valsi.notes: $x_2$ includes jei = rule ({jetpai}), ni = estimate ({lairpai}), ka = evaluate ({kairpai} or {vampai}), or nu = referee/arbitrate ({faurpai}); single events of judging including specific decisions/judgements (= {paijdi}, {jetpaijdi}, {lairpaijdi}, {kairpaijdi}, {vampaijdi}, {faurpaijdi}); jury (= {pairkamni}), serve on a jury (= {kamnypai}, as part of mass $x_1$). See also {cuxna}, {jdice}, {vajni}, {cipra}, {zekri}, {manri}, {mansa}.

valsi.definition: number/quantity: 1,000 expressed with comma.

$x_{1}$ are pants/trousers/slacks/leggings [legged garment] of material $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a palm tree (Palmae/Arecaceae) of species $x_2$

valsi.notes: Also pallet, when used for carrying rather than support on the ground; a tray is flat-bottomed and shallow or without a rim, and is generally portable. See also {tansi}, {patxu}, {palta}, {ckana}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ palpates/palps/touch-feels $x_2$ (surface structure)
$x_1$ is a Sith / Dark Jedi of power / level / rank $x_2$

$c_1$ is a dishwasher (machine).
malaria.
discursive: first utterance ordinal.
$x_{1}$ is a pump/injector [tool/apparatus] pumping/inserting fluid $x_{2}$ to $x_{3}$ from $x_{4}$ by means $x_{5}$.
valsi.notes: $x_2$ fluid may be liquid or gas; $x_5$ may be a force; a pump generally causes a pressure gradient, such that $x_3$ is a place of lower pressure, $x_4$ a place of higher pressure. (cf. {gapci}, {litki}, {rinci}; metaphorical use of {fepri} for gas, {risna} for liquid, {rinci}, {tutci})

valsi.definition: quantified selbri: convert 1 to cardinal selbri; $x_{1}$ is a set with single/sole/only member $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a papaya (fruit) of species/variety/cultivar $x_2$
valsi.notes: {rutrpaupau} is the non-experimental synonym of “pamga”. See also {grute}.

valsi.definition: $j_1$ hugs/embraces $j_2$ with $j_3$ (part of $j_1$) at locus $j_4$ (part of $j_2$).
$p_1&p_2=l_1$ (mass) date via route $l_2$ using means $l_3$.

$pr_1$=$pe_1$ is a lover of $pr_2$=$pe_2$.
$l_1$ is a lily of the Nile/African lily (genus Agapanthus) of species/strain $l_2$.
$x_1$ love each other; $x_1$ are in love

valsi.notes: An undetected emitter is odorless to the observer. See also {nazbi}, {sumne}, {cpina}, {vrusi}.

valsi.definition: $j_1=p_2$ is incense emitting odor $p_1$.

number/quantity: 10 [ten].
number/quantity: 10,000,000 [ten millions](Western numbering system/1,00,00,000 [100 lakhs](Indian numbering system).

$x_{1}$ is at peace with $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ parallels $x_{2}$ differing only in property $x_{3}$ (ka; jo'u/fa'u term) by standard/geometry $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Also: $x_1$ is parallel to $x_2$, $x_3$ is the only difference between $x_1$ and $x_2$ (= {terpanra} for reordered places); $x_1$ and $x_2$ are alike/similar/congruent. A parallel involves extreme close similarity/correspondence across the entirety of the things being compared, generally involving multiple properties, with focus placed on one or a small number of differences. See also {pa'a}, {mintu}, {simsa}, {girzu}, {vrici}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ protests/objects to/complains about $x_{2}$ (event/state) to audience $x_{3}$ with action $x_{4}$.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ make up/peace with each other under condition $x_2$.

valsi.notes: Also $x_1$ fraction/proportion/quotient; $x_2$ dividend/numerator; $x_3$ divisor/denominator. See also {frinu}, {dilcu}, {mekso}.

valsi.definition: number/quantity: 12 [twelve].
