valsi.notes: Also "x1 is part of list x4". cf. {cmima}, cmavo list {lu'a} and {lo'i}, {porsi}.

valsi.definition: $g_1$ frightens $t_1$ with/by $t_2$ (event).
$s_3$ is a activity/[party] for celebrating/recognizing/honoring $s_2$ (event/abstract) with participants $s_1$.
$x_1$ understands/interprets/perceives the meaning of utterance/message/communication/symbol $x_2$ as meaning $x_3$ (du'u)
$x_3=s_1$ is $x_2=s_2$ seconds in duration by standard $x_1=s_3$.
$x_1$ is a marriage tradition/custom/law according to which $x_2$ is married to $x_3$.
$b_1=s_3$ is a diving platform for diving/controlled falling to $s_2$ of diving tower/structure (natural/artificial) $b_2$.
$x_1$ is the modified part/modificand of binary metaphor $x_2$ with modifying part $x_3$, giving meaning $x_4$ in usage/instance $x_5$
valsi.notes: In both English and Lojban, the word {seltau} is the usual way to refer to the left word in a tanru, whereas {tertau} refers to the right word in the tanru.

valsi.definition: $t_3$ is a reading material / literature consisting of texts $t_2$ with audience $t_1$; $t_3$ is literary.
$x_{1}$ is a trillion [$10^{12}$] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$v_3$ evaluates $v_2$ (object) as $v_1$ (quality).
$x_3=v_1$ (object/event) is important/significant to $x_2=v_2$ (person/event) in aspect/for reason $x_1=v_3$ (nu/ka).
$x_1$ is a buyer purchasing goods $x_2$ from seller $x_3$ for amount/cost/expense $x_4$.
$v_3=c_1$ orders/requests $v_2=c_2$ from $v_1=c_3$ by means $c_4$.
Under conditions $x_{1}$, $x_{2}$ is seen by $x_{3}$.
$x_3$ is a/the sweat gland of body $x_2$ secreting sweat $x_1$.
$p_3$ makes an image of $p_2$ (object/concept) with result $p_1$ (picture) in medium $p_4$.
$x_{1}$ is a state returned to with returned $x_{2}$ with return $x_{3}$ with state returned from $x_{4}$.
$x_3=r_1$ engenders/procreates/begets $x_2=r_2$ with coparent $x_1=r_3$.
$s_1$ is a/the production inventory of sub-assemblies/components $s_2=z_3$ used by $z_1$ in the production/building/assembly of $z_2$.
$n_3$ is a nostril of $n_2$ (main body) in nose $n_1$.
$x_1$ is a right (entitlements/permissions of a legal/moral nature) of $x_2$ (action/quality) entitled to / held by $x_3$
$z_3$ is the purpose of action $z_2$ by agent $z_1$.
sarcu modal, 3rd place (conditions 2) necessarily; necessarily under ...
sidju modal, 3rd place assisting in doing/maintaining/achieving ...
tadji modal, 3rd place methodically doing (something) under conditions ...
tamsmi modal, 3rd place similarly; sharing common ideal form ...
valsi.notes: {tamsmi} is $x_1$ resembles $x_2$ sharing ideal form/shape $x_3$ in property $x_4$

valsi.definition: stidi modal, 3rd place suggestively; suggested to ...
tcika modal, 3rd place (for letters) as a time on day ...
xamgu modal, 3rd place good/beneficial by standard ...
zukte modal, 3rd place purposefully; (as an action) with goal ...
pro-sumti: this here; immediate demonstrative it; indicated thing/place near speaker.
location tense relation/direction; rearwards/to the rear of ...
evidential: I hear (hearsay).
$k_1$ withdraws to $k_2$ from origin $k_3=t_2$ via route $k_4$ using means/vehicle $k_5$.
$b_1$ gets behind $t_2$.
$v_1=c_1$ is a back door/gateway/access between $v_2$ and $v_3$ of structure $v_4$.
stidi modal, 1st place suggested by ...; proposed by ...
$x_1$ is a TV/television set/telly with screen/monitor $x_2$ and television receiver $x_3$.
valsi.notes: Synonymous to {veltivjoividni} which just seems too long for such a common concept. See also: television screen/monitor(={tivyvidni}).

valsi.definition: mathematical expression (mex) operator precedence (discursive).
tcika modal, 1st place (for letters) associated with time ... ; attach time stamp.
$x1=t1=p1$ is sly/cunning/wily, in tricking $x2=t2=p3$ into $x3=t3$
$ta_1$ is a disguise/camouflage worn by $ta_2$ to deceive $tc_2$ into $tc_3$.
valsi.notes: The implied $tc_1$ is the event of $ta_2$ wearing $ta_1$. The implied $ta_3$ is deceiving $tc_2$ into $tc_3$.

valsi.definition: $j_1=t_1$ stages, deceptively demonstrating $j_2$ to audience $j_3=t_2$.
$c_1=t_1$ lies, falsely expressing $c_2$ (text/concept) to audience $c_3=t_2$ by means $c_4$.
valsi.notes: Harmful intent or result is not implied. Cf. {cusku}, {tcica}, {jitfa}.

valsi.definition: $v_1$ fraudulently sells $v_2$ [goods/service/commodity] to buyer $v_3=t_2$ for amount/cost/expense $v_4$
Tianjin
$z_1$ is real/really exists in this universe for $z_2$ under metaphysics $z_3$.
$d_1$ (individual, mass) dances concert dance/performance dance to accompaniment/music/rhythm $d_2$, for/before audience $t_2$.
$x_{1}$ performs $x_{2}$ [performance] for/before audience $x_{3}$.
$x1=t1=c1$ plods on surface $x2=c2$ with limbs $x3=c3$
$x1=t1=f1$ slumps to $x2=f2$ from $x3=f3$ in reference frame $x4=f4$
$x_{1}$ kicks [hits with $x_{1}$'s foot/feet $x_{4}$] $x_{2}$ in/at locus $x_{3}$, using $x_{1}$'s foot/feet $x_{4}$.
$g_1$ adjusts/regulates/changes $g_2=s_2$ in amount/degree $s_3$.
$x_1$ is rich in details / detailed
$x_{1}$ is heavy/weighty in mass/weight by standard $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a linden of species $x_2$
$j_1$ micromanages $j_2$ in activity/event performance $j_3=t_2$.
$v_1$ sees/discerns/makes out the details of $t_2$ under conditions $v_3$.
$s_1$ is meteorology with methodology $s_2$.
$x_{1}$ obeys/follows the command/rule $x_{2}$ made by $x_{3}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is obedient.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of tin (Sn); [metaphor: cheap or base metal].
$t_1=j_1$ listens to/pays attention to sound $t_2=j_2$ with ambient background $t_3$.

$c_1=m_1=t_2$, sound produced by the friction/contact/rubbing between $m_2$ and $m_3$, is a gride sound/hair-raising/sets one's teeth on edge/squicks/gives the willies/heebie-jeebies to $t_1$, who hears it against background/noise $t_3$.
valsi.notes: This is epitomized by the sound of nails on a chalkboard. Short for seltinmosycpina. Cf. {pecrufcpina}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is stiff/rigid/inflexible/resistant in direction $x_{2}$ against force $x_{3}$ under conditions $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Also sometimes: firm, hard; not limited to physical forces; e.g. mental rigidity. See also {bapli}, {jdari}, {nandu}, {torni}, {trati}, {xarnu}, {danre}, {stodi}.

valsi.definition: $s_1=tu_1$ is a tool that aids $s_2=ti_1$ in hearing $ti_2$.
valsi.notes: Usually an electroacoustic apparatus that fits in or behind the wearer's ear, and is designed to amplify and modulate sound for the wearer. Cf. {tutci}, {cabra}.

valsi.definition: $z_1=t_1$ listen(s) to $z_2=t_2$ against background/noise $t_3$.
$x_1$ is a thylacine of species/breed $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ hears $x_{2}$ against background/noise $x_{3}$; $x_{2}$ is audible; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is aural.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of iron (Fe); [metaphor: strong, durable, tarnishing].
$x_1$ is a leopard of species/breed $x_2$ with coat markings $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a jaguar of species/breed with coat markings $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a tiger/leopard/jaguar/[tigress] of species/breed $x_{2}$ with coat markings $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: A great cat noted/recognized by its markings, metaphorically: stripes, tiger markings. See also {mlatu}.

valsi.definition: $c_1=t_1$ is is a tiglon/tigon of breed/variety $c_2=t_2$.
valsi.notes: A tiglon or tigon is a hybrid cross between a male tiger (Panthera tigris) and a lioness (Panthera leo).

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ (object) fills/becomes stuffed [up]/inflates/blows up with material $x_{2}$; $x_{2}$ pours into $x_{1}$.
valsi.notes: Implies some relative degree of fullness will result; agentive filling (= {tisyse'a}, {tisygau}, {tisyzu'e}); inflate/become inflated/blow up (= {gacytisna}, agentive {gacyse'a}); pour into (= {liktisna}, agentive {likse'a}). See also {culno}, {kunti}, {rinci}, {setca}.

valsi.definition: $t_1=c_1$ is a sausage filled with $t_2$.
$x_{1}$ is sweet/sugary/saccharine to observer $x_{2}$.
$n_1$ is a cake/cookie made from grains $n_2$.
$s_2=t_1$ is dessert(s)/sweet course(s) of meal $s_1$ (mass).
$sm_1$ is/are dessert spoon(s) [item of cutlery] suitable for eating dessert $sm_2=sa_2=t_1$ made of material $s_3$.
valsi.notes: See also: dessert spoon (measuring unit={mucyveldekpu})/measuring instrument={mucyveldekpyvau}).

valsi.definition: $s_1=t_1$ is a sweet/candy/confect.
$s_1=g_1$ is a licorice/liquorice plant (genus Glycyrrhiza) of species/strain/cultivar $s_2$.
$g_1=t_1$ is a liquorice/licorice root of plant/species $g_2$.
$g_1$ is a melon of cultivar $g_2$.
$x_{1}$ broadcasts/televises programming $x_{2}$ via medium/channel $x_{3}$ to television receiver $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Also $x_1$ is a broadcaster; $x_2$ programming (mass), program/show (ind.). See also {cradi}, {skina}, {vidni}, {benji}, {tcana}.

valsi.definition: $v_1$ is a TV screen/television monitor showing graphics/information from television receiver $t_4=v_2$.
Daughter
$m_1=t_2$ is the mother of daughter $m_2=t_1$.
$x_{1}$ is a daughter of mother/father/parents $x_{2}$; [not necessarily biological].
$m_1$ is a wheelchair/permobile carrying $m_2$ in/on surface/medium $m_3$, propelled by force $m_4$.
left parenthesis; start of parenthetical note which must be grammatical Lojban text.
lower-case letteral shift.
$x_1$ (la'e zo BY/word-bu) is a lower-case letter/digit/symbol in alphabet/character-set $x_2$ representing $x_3$.
conversion: move 3rd place to 1st position. Everything else stays in the same order.
valsi.notes: Before: x1 x2 x3 x4 x5, after: x3 x1 x2 x4 x5. Has the same effect as "te se". Proposed rafsi: -toz-

valsi.definition: polar opposite scalar negator.
negation sumti qualifier: the opposite of.
open editorial unquote (within a quote); contains grammatical text; mark with editorial insert.
location tense relation/direction; departing from/directly away from ...
discursive: in brief - in detail.
discursive: in brief - in detail.
$x_1=t_1$ tries to do/attain $x_2=t_2$ (ka) by actions/method $x_3=t_3$ (ka) for a total number of tries $x_4=r_2$.
$l_1$ is the chrysalis of species $t_2$.
$x_1$ is butterfly imago/adult butterfly of species $x_2$
$b_1$ is a sphenoid bone (os sphenoidale) performing function $b_2$ in body of $b_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a letteral with character set $x_{2}$ with signified by letteral $x_{3}$.
$v_1$ is a sostenuto pedal of instrument $x_2=t_3$.
$x_1$ [energy] is laser illuminating $x_2$ from light source $x_3$ with frequency $x_4$.
$x_1$ is a soft pedal of instrument $x_2=t_3$.
elidable terminator: right parenthesis/end unquote; seldom elidable except at end of text.
Tokyo
$x_{1}$ is an oven [enclosure that heats its contents] for baking/heating/drying $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ reflects Toki Pona culture/nationality/language in aspect $x_2$
$b_1$ is low/inferior/abject in property $b_2$ (ka) by standard $b_3$.
$b_1$ shrinks/contracts to size/into form $b_2$ from $b_3$.
$x_1$ (object) is utterly insufficient for purpose $x_2$ under conditions $x_3$.
$c_1$ materializes/suddenly appears at location $c_2$ according to senses/sensor $c_3$.
$c_1$ is busy.
$c_1$ [state/event/process] concludes/ceases/stops/ends its occurrence.
$g_1$ stops/ends $c_1$ [state/event/process].
$r_1$ is/are the ritual/proceedings for adjourning/ending $c_1$[event/state/process] by community $r_2$ with rules $c_4$.
$c_1$ is old (opposite of young) by standard $c_2$.
$x1=c1=z1$ grows old by amount $x2=z3$
(adjective:) $c_1$ is tame / “un-wild”.
$c_1$ is safe for $c_2$ under conditions $c_3$
$c_1$ is rude in matter $c_2$ according to standard/custom $c_3$.
$x_1$ arrives at $x_2$ via route $x_3$
$c_1$ leaves $c_2$, which he brought, at $c_3$
$x_1$ finds $x_2$ at location $x_3$
$x_1$ forbids/prohibits $x_2$ under conditions $x_3$.
$c_1$ (event/state/property) is impossible under condition $c_2$.
$x_1=c_1$ is cocky/chesty/arrogant about $x_1=c_2$ (abstraction).
$x_1$ is timid/shy/abashed/reluctant to do /be $x_2$.
$x_1$ discourages $x_2$ from doing/being $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a butterfly/moth of species/breed $x_{2}$.
$d_1$ (event) resumes/[continues/restarts] $d_2$ (object/event/process) due to quality $d_3$; $d_2$ starts again
$x_1$ is reluctant/unwilling/disinclined to $x_2$ for purpose $x_3$.
$d_1$ is wrong in property/aspect $d_2$ (ka) in situation $d_3$ by standard $d_4$.
$x_1$ is a monarch butterfly of subspecies $x_2$.
valsi.notes: Member of species Danaus plexippus. Cf. {toldi}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a shortage/deficiency/insufficiency/derth/too little of $x_2$ by standard $x_3$.
$f_1$ rises to $f_2$ from $f_3$ in gravity well/frame of reference $f_4$.
$k_1=f_1$ comes/goes against stream/current/gravity/force to destination $k_2=f_2$ from origin $k_3=f_3$ in in gravity well/frame of reference $f_4$ via route $k_4$ using means/vehicle $k_5$.
$f_1=b_1$ (action/event) becomes calm/calms down/is pacified under conditions $f_2$ by standard $b_3$.
$x_1=t_1=g_1$ is inert gas of material/composition including $x_2=g_2$, under conditions $x_3=g_3$.
valsi.notes: Inert gases are different from noble gases both in the intension and the extension. Noble gases, nitrogen gas and some compound gases are called inert gas depending on context, though some heavier noble gases, as well as nitrogen, react with other substances under certain conditions. See {to'e} {frati} {gapci}; {navni}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a irrational number.
$g_1$ is gloomy/downcast/unhappy about $g_2$ (event/state).
$m_1=g_1$ is miserable/in dispair about $g_2$ (event/state).
$x_1=ga_1$ unrolls/unravels object $x_2=gu_1$ on/against surface $x_3=gu_2$, with axis/ axle of rotation $x_4=gu_3$.
j$_1$ lets go/releases $j_2$ from $j_3$ (part of j1) at locus $j_4$ (part of j2).
$x_1$ avoids/ignores/directs attention away from object/affair $x_2$.
$x1=j1$ is gentle to $x2=j2$
$k_1$ (object/commodity/property/event) is inexpensive to $k_2$ by standard $k_3$.
$x_1$ is callous/implacable/heartless/merciless/ruthless towards $x_2$ (person) about $x_3$ (abstraction).
$x_1$ disbelieves/rejects $x_2$ as false about $x_3$.
$k_1$ is a ridge in/on object/surface $k_2$.
$k_1$ feels discomfort/is uncomfortable with conditions/environmental property(ies) k2.
$b_1=m_3$ grandly exhibits the corruptness $b_2=m_1$ of unethical mass $b_3=m_2$.
$m_1$ is incompatible with $m_2$ in aspect $m_3$.
$c_1=m_2$ (person) is unintelligent/dumb/stupid by standard $c_3$.
$g_1$ deciphers $m_1$ into $m_2$ out of coding system $m_3$.
$x_{1}$ is ugly to $x_{2}$ in aspect $x_{3}$ (ka) by aesthetic standard $x_{4}$.
$z_1=m_1$ is uglier/[more unsightly] than $z_2$ to $m_2$ in aspect $m_3$ (ka) by amount $z_4$.
$ml_1=me_1$ is less ugly/unsightly than $ml_2$ to $me_2$ in aspect $me_3$ (ka) by amount $ml_4$.
$m_1=t_1$ is the ugliest/[most unsightly] among set/range $t_3$ to $m_2$ in aspect $m_3$ (ka) by aesthetic standard $m_4$.
$m_1=t_1$ is hideous/grotesque to $t_2$ in aspect $t_3$ (ka) by aesthetic standard $t_4$.
$m_1$ forgets fact/memory $m_2$ about subject $m_3$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {to'e}, {morji}, {nalmo'i}. Assumes that {morji} refers to a change of state i.e. 'remember'= 'bring to mind'.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ invents strategy (long-term plan) $x_2$ for achieving $x_3$ (event/state).
$x_1$ (du'u) confirms/corroborates/verifies $x_2$ (du'u) under rules/logic $x_3$ .
$s_1$ is threatened by $s_2$ (event)
$x_1$ despairs/is despondent/pessimistic about $x_2$, expected likelihood $x_3$.
$x_1$ is thin/skinny/[underweight] [excessively thin/unswollen] by standard $x_2$
valsi.notes: If you believe in a difference between {rotsu} and {plana}, then you believe in the difference between {cinla} and {tolplana}. cf. {barda}, {cinla}, {ganra}, {rotsu}, {clani}, {tordu}, {condi}, {caxno}, {cmalu}, {plana}.

valsi.definition: $p_1$ (force) unbends/smoothens/flattens $p_2$ at locus/flatten crease(s)/bend(s) $p_3$.
$p_1=g_1$ [person/agent] unbends/smoothens/flattens $p_2$ at locus/flatten crease(s)/bend(s) $p_3$.
$x_1$ is functional/operational/usable for function $x_2$; $x_1$ works properly
$x_1$ is a damage/harm/loss to $x_2$ resulting from activity/process $x_3$.
$x_1$ releases $x_2$ from restraint/binding $x_3$ to do/be $x_4$ .
$r_1$ opposite of greets / offers goodbyes to $r_2$ in manner $r_3$ (action).
$j_1=r_1$ is/pertains to nature (geology/wildlife).
$s_1$ blows/exhales fluid/gas from high pressure of $s_2$ to low pressure of $s_3$.
$s_1$ (agent) withdraws/pulls out/extracts/removes $s_2$ from interior/members of $s_3$
$x_1=c_2$ is bored with $x_2=c_1$.
$m_2$ is dissatisfied by $m_1$ with regard to property (ka)/state $m_3$.
$t_2$ (load/force/torque) untwists $t_1$.
$x_1$ disrespects/disregards/snubs/derides $x_2$.
$t_1=s_1$ holds $s_2$ in utmost contempt among set/range $t_4$.
$x_{1}$ [agent] begins activity/process/state $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ (event/state) is deliberate/intentional on the part of $x_2$; $x_1$ is deliberate.
$x_1$ is a bachelor / single / unmarried.
$x_1$ is capable of performing functions/ready for use or service $x_2$; $x_1$ is operable, functional, operational, usable, unbroken, useable, utile
$d_2=s_2$ is a con/contra-argument (C) against argument $s_2$, by arguer $d_1$.
$x_{1}$ [agent] begins activity/process/state $x_{2}$.
$s_1$ expends effort/is actively/effortfully involved in doing/being $s_2$ (activity)
$t_{1}$ is quenched and has enough of drink/fluid/lubrication $t_{2}$.
$x_1$ is little/limited in property $x_2$ towards $x_3$.
$g_1$ unlocks lock $s_1$ on $s_2$ by mechanism $s_3$.
$x_{1}$ is flexible/supple/limber/bendable/non-resistant in direction $x_{2}$ against force $x_{3}$ under conditions $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: not limited to physical forces; e.g. mental rigidity. See also {tinsa}, {ranti}, {bapli}, {jdari}, {nandu}, {torni}, {trati}, {xarnu}, {danre}, {stodi}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ disagrees with person(s)/position/side $x_2$ that $x_3$ (du'u) is true about matter $x_4$.
$x_1$ is a coward in activity $x_2$ (event) by standard $x_3$.
$v_1$ is immoral by standard $v_2$.
rabies.
$x_1$ is rabid with symptoms $x_2$.
$xa_1$ is sated/full and has enough of food/fuel $xa_1$.
$x_1$ is calm/tranquil/serene about $x_2$ (abstraction) under conditions $x_3$.
$x_1$ is a real number.
valsi.notes: {mrena'u} is another lujvo for the same meaning. Cf. {to'e} {xanri} {namcu}, {mrena'u}; {xarna'u}, {lujna'u}; {ka'o}

valsi.definition: $x_1=g_1$ separates/unmixes $x_2=m_1$ into components $x_3=m_2$.
$x_1$ (agent) denies that $x_2$ (du'u) is true.
$x_1$ is soft/quiet/making only a bit of noise, at observation point $x_2$ by standard $x_3$.
valsi.notes: “Silent” is {smaji}, whereas tolylau refers to a small amount of sound. Likewise, “totally noisy” is {tolsma}, which is even greater than {cladu}. {smaji} < {tolylau} < {cladu} < {tolsma}.

valsi.definition: $g_1$ unbalances $l_1$ with force $l_2$.
$c_1$ arrives at $c_2$ via route $c_3$.
$x_1$ disapproves of/objects to plan/action $x_2$.
$x_1$ is boring/dreary/wearisome/tedious to $x_2$ in property/aspect $x_3$.
$x_1$ is Arctic in aspect $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a tone/note of frequency/pitch $x_{2}$ from source $x_{3}$.
$x1=tor1=ton1$ is a squeak from source $x2=ton3$
$x_1$ is $x_2$ torrs by standard $x_3$.
$c_1$ is a dwarf of mythos/religion $c_2$, short by measurement standard $t_3$.
$x_{1}$ is short in dimension/direction $x_{2}$ (default longest dimension) by measurement standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ twists under load/force/torsion $x_{2}$.
$t_1=p_1$ is a dwarf/midget [short in stature resulting from a medical condition; not not necessarily human] by standard $t_3$.
valsi.notes: Not to be confused with "Little people [mythology]" (={ridytorpre}), "Hobbit" (={ridrxobi}), "Dwarf" [mythology/fantasy] (={ridrdverga}).

valsi.definition: $x1=s1$ naps/[sleeps for a short time]
$t_1$ is a short time/duration/interval/period/elapsed time from time/event $t_2$ to time/event $t_3$.
$x_1=t_1$ is hypocritical in action $t_2=d_1$, which is contrary to assertion $x_2$, under conditions $t_3$.
$x_{1}$ is superlative in property $x_{2}$ (ka), the $x_{3}$ extreme (ka; default ka zmadu) among set/range $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Also: $x_1$ is $x_3$-est/utmost in $x_2$ among $x_4$; $x_1$ is the $x_3$ end of $x_4$; $x_1$ is extreme; $x_1$ is simply $x_3$. (cf. cmavo list {rai}, {jimte}, {milxe}, {mutce}, note contrast with milxe and mutce rather than with mleca and zmadu, which are values for $x_3$, {banli}, {curve}, {fanmo}, {krasi}, {manfo}, {prane})

(cf. {jdima}, {jerna}, {vecnu}, {dirba}, {janta}, {kargu}, {pleji}; see note at jdima on cost/price/value distinction, {vajni})

$x_{1}$ [seller] sells/vends $x_{2}$ [goods/service/commodity] to buyer $x_{3}$ for amount/cost/expense $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: $x_1$ is a salesperson/salesman/vendor; $x_3$ buys $x_2$ from $x_1$ (= {terve'u} for reordered terms); $x_4$ is the price of $x_2$ to $x_3$ (= {velve'u} for reordered terms); for sale (= {fitselve'u}, {selvenfriti}); $x_2$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posyve'u}, {posyselve'u} for unambiguous semantics). (cf. {canja}, {dunda}, {janta}, {pleji}, {jerna}, {kargu}, {prali}, {zarci}, {vamji}, {jdima}; see note at {jdima} on cost/price/value distinction, {fepni}, {friti}, {jerna}, {rupnu})

valsi.notes: Refers to Spanish-speaking Latin-American countries, not Brazil/Guyana. See also {merko}, {mexno}, {spano}, {ketco}, {bemro}, {gento}.

valsi.definition: $x_1=b_1=m_1$ is a cathedral [Christian church which contains the seat of a bishop] serving diocese $m_2$.
$n_1$ is Christmas Eve of Christmas Day $n_2$ at location $n_3$.
$d_1$ is Christmas Day at location $d_3$ in calendar $d_4$.
$n_1$ is the Christmas celebrated by $s_1$ with activities $s_3$.
$d_1$ is spiteful/malevolent/malicious/mean to/towards $x_2$.
$x_1$ suffers from $x_2$ (event, process, object).
$f_1=xl_1$ is unlucky/unfortunate for $f_2=xl_2$ by standerd $xl_3$.
$j_1$ is pessimistic about $j_3$.
$t_1=xl_1$ is malware (malicious software) on computer(s) including $s_1$, which is/does bad for/harms $xl_2$ according to standard $xl_3$.
$x_{1}$ is bad for $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is poor/unacceptable to $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Be careful to distinguish between a bad/unacceptable event, and a bad/unacceptable agent: $x_1$ does poorly (= lenu ko'a gasnu cu xlali and not normally ko'a {xlali}). See also {palci}, {mabla}, {xamgu}, {betri}.

valsi.definition: $x_1=m_1$ is worse than $m_2$ for $x_2$ by standard $x_3$, by amount $m_3$.
x1=m1 is better/[less bad] than $m_2$ for $x_2$ by standard $x_3$, by amount $m_4$.
$j_1$ is cynical/suspicious about the motives of $m_3$ with regard to action/event $m_2=j_3$.
$t_1=x_1$ is the worst among set/range $t_4$ for $x_2$ by standard $x_3$.
$t_1=xl_1$ is bad weather at place/region $t_2$ for $x_3=xl_2$ by standard $x_4=xl_3$.
$b_1=c_1$ is a heifer [young female cattle/beef-producer/bovine], of age $n_2$, immature/defined as a heifer by standard $n_3$, of species/breed $b_2$.
$x_1$ is September of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ (agent) influences/lures/tempts $x_{2}$ into action/state $x_{3}$ by influence/threat/lure $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Also impresses; $x_4$ is alluring (= {trivelxlu} for place reordering); $x_3$ may be an achieved action/state, or an attempt to perform an action/enter a state). ($x_3$ and $x_4$ are normally events or states); See also {djica}, {mukti}, {trina}, {jitro}, {sazri}, {tcica}, {xance}, {stidi}, {kajde}, {maksi}.

valsi.definition: $s_1$ drives vehicle $m_1$ illegally according to people/culture/judges/prosecutor $z_2$ under influence of $x_1$ (agent/property/substance) which affects driving with effect $x_2$.
digit/number: number/digit/lerfu question.
Loglan toggle: Toggles text to TLI Loglan; marks following text as TLI Loglan.
valsi.notes: The proposal also includes an experimental Loglan Little word ``hoa'' (which toggles text to Lojban).

valsi.definition: conversion: move 5th place to 1st position. Everything else stays in the same order.
valsi.notes: Before: x1 x2 x3 x4 x5, after: x5 x1 x2 x3 x4. Has the same effect as "xe ve te se". Proposed rafsi: -xoz-

valsi.definition: elliptical/unspecified number.
Extracts selbri from a tag, inverse of fi'o
valsi.notes: xo'i bau is equivalent to bangu, xo'i fi'o broda is equivalent to broda

valsi.definition: attitudinal modifier: sarcastically - sincerely
valsi.notes: There is no good attitudinal for sarcasm. Chosen for its similarity to {zo'o}.

valsi.definition: Xod.
valsi.notes: A name used by Charles Hope.

valsi.definition: converts bridi into nonce modal/sumti tag clause sharing common places with the main clause
valsi.notes: 1. The first place containing abstraction (if present in the predicate of the subordinate clause) is automatically applied to the whole bridi if not explicitly defined otherwise 2. If the first place is an object it's applied to the first place of the bridi. See also {fi'o}

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is an ocotillo of species $x_2$
Hong Kong.
$x_1$ is sesame of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_1$ pertains to Xorban language/culture in aspect $x_2$

Jorge.

$x_1=min_1$ is a blender/mixer for ingredients $x_2=mix_2$ to produce mixture $x_3=mix_1$.
$x_{1}$ pertains to the Christian religion/culture/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.
Christ.
$x_1$ is the Christian Bible of Christian denomination $x_2$
$x_1$ is buckwheat of variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of buckwheat/rhubarb/sorrel grass of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$b_1=x_1$ takes/carries back $b_2=x_2$ to origin/earlier state $b_3=x_3$ from $b_4=x_4$ over path $b_5$.
$c_1$ requests/asks $c_2$ to go back/return to $x_2$ from $x_3$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {xruti}, {cpedu}. Based on proposed redefinition of {xruti} by xorxes: x1 returns to x2 from x3.

valsi.definition: $g_1$ causes $x_1$ to return to state $x_2$ from state $x_3$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {xruti}, {gasnu}. Based on proposed redefinition of {xruti} by xorxes: x1 returns to state x2 from state x3.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a turkey [food/bird] of species/breed $x_{2}$.
$x_1=xr_1=xr_2=k_1$ returns to earlier location $x_2=xr_3=k_2$ from $x_3=xr_4=k_3$ via route $x_4=k_4$ using means/vehicle $x_5=k_5$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the flower/blossom/bloom [body-part] of plant/species $x_{2}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is floral.
$x_1$ is a quantity of ranunculus/buttercup/spearwort/water crowfoot of species/strain $x_2$
$x_1$ is a quantity of lavender of species/strain $x_2$
$x_{1}$ (agent) returns $x_{2}$ to origin/earlier state $x_{3}$ from $x_{4}$; $x_{1}$ moves/gives $x_{2}$ back to $x_{3}$ from $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: $x_2$ goes back/reverts/Retreats. to $x_3$ (= {se'ixru} for agent self-returning to a previous location/situation: renumber places in the lujvo); ($x_3$ may be a location or a person or an event/situation; the latter may also be expressed with {krefu} or {rapli} and a causative like {rinka}/{rikygau}). See also {benji}, {krefu}, {rapli}, {rinka}.

valsi.definition: Croatia.
discursive: true-false question.
$x_1$ is an element of compound $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a quantity of rhubarb (genus Rheum) of species/strain x2.
$x_1$ is a quantity of dock/sorrel grass of species/strain x2.
$x_{1}$ is an instance of substance/chemical/drug $x_{2}$ (individual or mass) with purity $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is an instance of annonin (individual or mass) with purity $x_2$.
$x_1$ is meleagrology based on methodology $x_2$.
$x_1=t_1$ is an iron for straightening cloths $x_2=b_1=xu_1$ of material $x_3=b_2$.
$x_1 = c_1$ is a gun/chemically launched metal slug throwing weapon for use against $x_2$ by $x_3$; weapon fires metallic objects $x_4$ using chemical propellant $x_5$.
$x_1$ is an instance of erythravine with purity $x_3$.
$x_1$ is an instance of beryllium (Be) with purity $x_3$.
$x_1$ is an instance of boron (B) with purity $x_3$.
valsi.notes: The name boron originates from the Arabic word buraq or the Persian word burah; which are names for the mineral borax (={kunrbura}).

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a quantity of concrete made from ingredients $x_2$.
$x_1$ is an instance of swainsonine [indolizidine alkaloid] (individual or mass) with purity $x_3$.
valsi.notes: Swainsonine is a natural product that has been isolated from numerous species of flowering plants and some fungi (see Locoweed). It was first isolated from the plant Swainsona (={sparsueinsona}) in Australia.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is an instance of vanillin (individual or mass) with purity $x_2$.
$x_1$ is chemistry based on methodology $x_2$.
$s_1$ is a molecule of chemical $x_2$.
$s_1$ is high/stoned/trips on drug $xu_1$, hallucinating/experiencing $s_2$ (fact/idea/event/state).

$t_1$ is a chemical compound of $t_2$ and $t_3$.
$b_1=x_1$ is pink.
$x_1$ is a northern red oak (Quercus rubra) of species/strain $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is red/crimson/ruddy [color adjective].
$x_1$ is a cherry [berry] of species/variety $x_2$
$s_1$ is a red/purple onion (Allium cepa) of variety/strain $s_2$.

$x_{1}$ reflects Urdu language/culture/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.
$l_1$ [rules/methods] is a propositional logic for deducing/concluding/inferring/reasoning to/about $l_2$ (du'u) with propositions $xu_2$.
$x_{1}$ (agent) asserts/claims/declares $x_{2}$ (du'u) is true [can be used for epistemology of authority].
valsi.notes: Also: $x_1$ states/says that/affirms/purports to know that $x_2$. (cf. {natfe} which is propositional and non-agentive, {nupre})

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is vetiver of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is smooth/even/[soft/silky] in texture/regularity.
letteral for x.
Hong Kong.
hesitation noise; maintains the floor while speaker decides what to say next.
letteral for '.
letteral for y.
time tense distance: medium distance in time.
evidential: I observe.
time tense distance: an unspecified distance in time
valsi.notes: Used to express a time distance without specifying any subjective notion about its size. May typically be used in a question when the subjective notion is not known. See also {za}, {zi}, {zu}, {ze'ai}

valsi.definition: forethought nonce-word indicator; indicates next word is nonce-creation and may be nonstandard.
abstractor: state (event) abstractor; $x_{1}$ is continuous state of [bridi] being true.
interval event contour: continuing too long after natural end of ...; superfective | ---->.
digit/number: greater than.
discursive: further utterance ordinal
again; in addition to the first time; for the (> 1)th time
$s_1$ is a/the gluteal muscle/"glutes" [body-part] controlling $s_2$, of body $s_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a favorable connotation/sense/way-of-looking-at $x_{2}$ used by $x_{3}$.
$c_1$ the telemarketing business/activity/function for goods/products/services/activities $z_2$.
$p_1=z_1$ is a market place/square/area managed by $p_2$ for selling/trading $z_2$ by traders $z_3$.
$t_1$ is the thigh of $t_2=z_2$.
valsi.notes: The thigh is the area between the pelvis and the knee. Anatomically, it is part of the lower limb. Cf. {tuple}.

valsi.definition: $f_1$ is a/the intergluteal/natal cleft/vertical gluteal crease/butt crack between the buttocks of $z_2=f_2$.
2-word letteral/shift: alternate alphabet selector follows.
attitudinal modifier: observed emotion; preceding attitudinal is observed on listener
valsi.notes: Replaces recent questionable usage of dai, which should be reserved for situations in which the speaker also feels the emotion. ui nai zai'a - I see you are unhappy. (Note that observation is not limited to visual)

valsi.definition: $c_1$ is a marketing /business/activity/function for goods/products/services/activities $z_2$.
$c_1$ is the marketing communications business/activity/function supporting the sales/promotion of goods/products/services/activities $z_2$.
$z_1=s_1$ is a shop/store of market/mall $s_2$, selling $x_3=z_2$, operated by $x_4=z_3$.

$s_1=z_1$ dives gymnastically [manner of controlled falling] performing trick $z_2$ to $s_2$ from $s_3$ into liquid $j_2$.
$x_1$ is a spiny anteater of species $x_2$.
$x1=m1$ is a mill for grinding $x2=z2$ into $x3=z3$
$t_1$ is a patty of ground/pulverized material $t_2=z_2$, shape $t_3$, thickness $t_4$.
$x_{1}$ [individual or mass of hard surfaces] grinds/pulverizes/crushes $x_{2}$ into powder $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: May need mosra tanru. See also {daspo}, {purmo}, {marxa}, {pulce}, {canre}, {molki}.

valsi.definition: $b_1$ is naïve about $z_2$

$l_1=z_3$ enjoys $z_1=l_2$.

$zm_1=za_1$ is better than $zm_2$ in property $za_2$ according to standard $za_3$ by amount $zm_4$.
$t_1=z_1$ is most favourable among set/range $t_4$ in property $z_2$ according to standard $z_3$.
$x_{1}$ approves of/gives favor to plan/action $x_{2}$ (object/event).
$x_1$ is a paradise/paradisaic place defined/governed by rules $x_2$
$f_2$ is lucky/fortunate in $f_1=z_2$ (event/property).
$x_1$ does/is $x_2$ (ka) at a leisurely pace
$x_1$ is welcomed by $x_2$ to place/event $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a market/store/exchange/shop(s) selling/trading (for) $x_{2}$, operated by/with participants $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also: mall, marketplace, shopping center, cooperative, bazaar, trading post, mart; the concept is the function of selling/exchanging coupled with a location, and is more oriented to the larger concept of marketplace than the stalls/shops that comprise it, though it does not exclude the latter individual shops (= {zaisle}); $x_3$ may include both owners/proprietors and customers in some markets, but in most contexts refers only to the operators. See also {vecnu}, {canja}, {dinju}, {banxa}.

valsi.definition: $z_1=c_1$ accepts $z_2=c_2$ (object/event) from source $c_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the buttock(s)/arse/rear/seat [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: rounded surface, support].
valsi.notes: Also ass, behind, butt. See also {ganxo}, {mabla}.

valsi.definition: $s_1$ is temporary memory for fact(s) $s_2=m_2$ in containment $s_3$.
$x_{1}$ is temporary/not permanent/expected to change in property $x_{2}$ (ka) by standard/expectant $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ exists/is real/actual/reality for $x_{2}$ under metaphysics $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Words usable for epistemology typically have a du'u place. $x_1$ is physical (one sense). See also {fatci}, {xanri}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ stays/lodges at a hotel/in a location $x_2$; $x_1$ is a temporal resident of $x_2$.
$s_1$ pauses/temporarily halts activity/process/state $s_2$.

$r_1=z_1$ exists over interval $r_2$.
valsi.notes: $r_1=z_1$ is $r_2$ years/days etc. old. Not restricted to biological forms. Cf. {zasti}, {ranji}, {temci}, {ditcu}, {jbena}, {morsi}, {cfari}, {fanmo}, {jmive}.

valsi.definition: $s_1$ is ontology based on methodology/metaphysics $s_3=z_3$.
$s_1$ (idea abstract) is materialism/an idea that the only thing that exists is matter, based on the works of thinker $s_3$.
zanru modal, 1st place approved by ...

valsi.notes: Also: $x_1$ occupies $x_2$ pleasantly; $x_1$ is fun for $x_2$; $x_2$ is amused by $x_1$; $x_2$ has fun (at) doing $x_1$; $x_1$ is an amusement/entertainment/game for $x_2$. See also {cinri}, {panka}, {xajmi} for funny, {kelci}.

digit/number: 7 (digit) [seven].
time tense interval: a medium length of time.
time tense: a medium time interval offset towards the future; (tense/modal).
time tense: a medium time interval spanning the present; (tense/modal).
time tense interval: an unspecified amount of time
valsi.notes: Used to express a duration without specifying any subjective notion about its length. May typically be used in a question when the subjective notion is not known. See also {ze'a}, {ze'i}, {ze'u}, {ze'e}, {za'ai}

valsi.definition: time tense: a medium time interval offset towards the past; (tense/modal).
time tense interval: the whole of time.
nonce word with existing grammar
valsi.notes: Binds two arbitrary words together to form a nonce word whose semantics are indicated by the left word and whose grammar is the same as that of the right word. Useful for creating function words without having to allocate experimental cmavo forms.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is an evergreen tree of species/variety $x_2$.
time tense interval: an instantaneous/tiny/short amount of time.

valsi.notes: {ze'i} is built in to the word.

valsi.definition: location tense relation/direction; beyond/outward/receding from ...

$d_2$ is/are the long-term indebtedness/liabilities of company/corporation/firm $d_1$ to creditor(s) $d_3$ for the provision of goods /services/loans $d_4$.
joins preceding and following words into a lujvo.
number/quantity: 7,000 expressed with comma.

valsi.definition: July.
$x_1$ is July/the seventh month of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.

valsi.notes: Cf. {ze}, {moi}, {jatna}, {jemja'a}, {vairsoi}, {bivmoija'a}, {xavmoija'a}. Based on STANAG 2116: NATO Codes for Grades of Military Personnel.

valsi.definition: Uranus.
$p_1$ is the seventh closest planet (default is Uranus if p2 is the Sun) revolving around $p_2$ (default is the Sun), with planetary characteristics $p_3$, orbital parameters $p_4$.

$x_1$ is a nonsense zei-lujvo using parts $x_2$, silly by standard $x_3$.
valsi.notes: This lujvo parses in jbofi'e as an artifact of how high precedence {zei} is, and how {zo} erasure works. Specifically, [zo WORD si] has not erased the entire {zo} clause but has killed {zo}'s "magic". {fa'o} and quoted {si} are replaceable, but thrown in for fun, to have a full magic-word lujvo.
